thread.title: John Deere partners with Kespry to bring drones and aerial data to construction and forestry
thread.title_full: John Deere partners with Kespry to bring drones and aerial data to construction and forestry

author: Pollyanna
title: John Deere partners with Kespry to bring drones and aerial data to construction and forestry
text:
By Lora Kolodny 
Heavy equipment makers Deere & Co., better known as John Deere, have forged a strategic alliance with drone-tech startup Kespry, the companies announced at CONEXPO, an international trade show for the construction industry in Las Vegas on Tuesday. The deal could prove a boon for sales of Kespry’s drones and data analytics software. It could help John Deere tap into a new, high-tech… Read More
